channel.title: FS or Trade - Axoloti Hardware
channel.description: Axoloti Hardware Build for sale - $500 USD This is an axoloti built with 15 potentiometers, two buttons and an oled screen, all tested and working with gpio assignment. I purchased this second hand so I did not receive build or technical support from the original designer, but it's pretty straightforward as long as you can maneuver around the axoloti software and assign gpios. I will include an sd card and am happy to share my patches if wanted. Great design and allows for so much flexibility, I am only selling because I just don't have enough free time to really invest in the possibilities of axoloti patching. Only had a few months and had lots of fun tweaking live patches. The price is set to adjust for what I originally paid as well as international shipping, as I live in Thailand. May be adjustable depending on location, feel free to ask any questions!

This is an axoloti built with 15 potentiometers, two buttons and an oled screen, all tested and working with gpio assignment. I purchased this second hand so I did not receive build or technical support from the original designer, but it's pretty straightforward as long as you can maneuver around the axoloti software and assign gpios. Great design and allows for so much flexibility, I am only selling because I just don't have enough free time to really invest in the possibilities of axoloti patching. Only had a few months and had lots of fun tweaking live patches.

The price is set to adjust for what I originally paid as well as international shipping, as I live in Thailand. May be adjustable depending on location, feel free to ask any questions!
